data.name: Inyectar Mensaje
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="direct:{{source}}"/>
    <setBody>
        <simple>
<![CDATA[{{escapeMessage code}}]]>
        </simple>
    </setBody>
    <to uri="micrometer:counter:inject_counter_total?increment=1"/>
    {{applyUnmarshal output_format}}
    {{applyMarshal output_format}}
    {{generateDestination target}}
</route>
